summary: The true story of an Argentine family who lived with Josef Mengele without knowing his true identity, and of a girl who fell in love with one of the biggest criminals of all time.
cast: Alex Brendemühl|Natalia Oreiro|Diego Peretti|Elena Roger|Guillermo Pfening|Florencia Bado|Alan Daicz|Nicolas Marsella|Ana Pauls|Juan I. Martínez|Carlos Kaspar|Abril Braunstein|Maria V. Barret|Benito E. Crespo|Sebástian Cáneva|Hartmut Becher|Valeria Radivo|Ricardo Truppel|Marcelo 'Hos' Bearzi|Maia Muravchik|Tobías González Varceló|Matíaz Zunino|Martín Willnecker|Tomás Jacob|Brian Sichel|Julia Zey|Sofía Stieglitz|Diego Acosta
title: El médico alemán (Wakolda)
